upgrade.0: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 7% ATK increase and a 3% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.
upgrade.1: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 8% ATK increase and a 4% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.
upgrade.2: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 9% ATK increase and a 5% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.
upgrade.3: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 10% ATK increase and a 6% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.
upgrade.4: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 11% ATK increase and a 7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.
